name: Darn Tough Derby Light Cushion Crew Socks - Unisex
description: Do away with boring socks. The fine-gauge knitting keeps these socks itch-free and lets your feet breathe, and the geometric design adds some fun to your urban treks. Seamless construction provides a smooth fit and ensures no slipping, no bunching and no blisters.Made of fine-gauge merino wool, nylon and Lycra® for coolness in the summer, warmth in winter.Performance fit hugs your foot to ensure no slipping, bunching or blisters.True Seamless™ construction makes them irresistibly comfortable.Darn Tough sources its wool from non-mulesed sheep.
